mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "To the Square Dancers of the World", "The Past of Square Dancing", "Square Dancing Today", "The Future of Our Hobby", "The Silver Spur Award", "Square Dancing on Radio and Television", "The Thoughts of a Beginner", "Bouncing in Bavaria", "Square Dancing for Young People", "Background on the National Convention", "Care of Your Square Dance Records", "All Areas Sound Off", "Packing Tips for Square Dance Trips", "Teaching the Teachers", "are You Caller Blind?", and "My Job- Prepare 'Em". REGULAR FEATURES "Square Dance Date Book", "As I See It", "Chuck Jones' Notebook", "Style Series: Bad Habits & Roughness", "Refreshment Time", "Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop Squares and Rounds", "Paging the Roundancers: The Sommervilles", "Caller of the Month: Bill Sawtelle", "From the Floor", "Ladies on the Square: If the Shoe Fits", and "Style Series: Harlem Rosette".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
